name: vk-bogo-language-switcher
description: Bogo の言語切替えメニューにスタイルオプションを追加します。

scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run copy
scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist/vk-bogo-language-switcher && cp -r assets includes readme.txt vk-bogo-language-switcher.php dist/vk-bogo-language-switcher/
scripts.zip: npm run dist && cd dist && zip -r vk-bogo-language-switcher.zip vk-bogo-language-switcher

author: Vektor,Inc.
